attributes.action: Ensure appropriate remuneration for the increase in weekly working hours for Radiographers, as a result of Agenda for Change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under AfC, the hours worked per week for radiographers will be increased from 35 to 37.5, but there will be no commensurate increase in pay!  This is not acceptable, & lowers morale in a workforce of which there is already a national shortage.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ensure appropriate remuneration for the increase in weekly working hours for Radiographers, as a result of Agenda for Change."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14267.asp
